DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Kinesio Taping Treat Muscular Joint Problems Chronic Venous Insufficiency
DOC.detailed_description: Chronic Venous Insufficiency ( CVI ) common disease . Patients pathology present peripheral muscle pump impairment restrict range ankle motion . Few data available use chronic venous insufficiency patient Kinesio Taping , physical therapist 's elastic dressing permit action muscle activity joint range .
DOC.criteria: Age 50 75 year . Mildmoderate Chronic Venous Insufficiency ( grade C1 , C2 , C3 clinicaletiologicanatomicpathophysiologic ( CEAP ) scale ) Chronic Venous Insufficiency ( > grade C3 ) Arterial disorder Cardiorespiratory disease Contraindications Kinesio Taping technique include thrombosis , wound , severe trauma , generalize edema secondary cardiac renal problem , carcinoma , intolerability of/allergy surgical tape pregnancy .
